title: AN ACT proposing to create a new section of the Constitution of Kentucky relating to the exemption of state and local excise, sales, and use taxes from food, food ingredients, prescription drugs, and residential and on-farm utilities.
subject: Constitution, Ky.
County Clerks
Elections and Voting
Local Government
Local Mandate
Taxation
Taxation, Sales and Use

abstracts.abstract: Propose to create a new section of the Constitution of Kentucky to exempt from state and local excise, sales, and use taxes food, food ingredients, prescription drugs, residential utilities, and on-farm utilities; provide ballot language; submit to voters for ratification or rejection.

actions.description: to Elections, Const. Amendments & Intergovernmental Affairs (H)
